attributes.action: Pass a Bill deporting Abu Qatada
attributes.additional_details:
Abu Qatada is an extremist terrorist who must be deported immediately.

However, under Parliamentary Sovereignty and considering the fact that the UK has an unwritten Constitution, Parliament can pass a Bill to deport Abu Qatada back to Jordan and this would be legal.

Parliament has the power to legislate in all matters and if it passes a law to deport him, it would make the deportation legal and not illegal under Human Rights law.
